Typealiases.html#/s:10AppToolkit13Transa.name: TransactionID
Typealiases.html#/s:10AppToolkit13Transa.abstract: Unique ID issued for every command. You’ll only need to use this command to

Typealiases.html#/s:10AppToolkit12LookAt.name: LookAtEntity
Typealiases.html#/s:10AppToolkit12LookAt.abstract: ID you get back from LPS system for entity. Entity can be face or motion or any other visual entity.

Structs/SpeakerId.html#/s:10AppToolkit9S.name: type
Structs/SpeakerId.html#/s:10AppToolkit9S.abstract: If the speaker is a loop member or not

Structs/SpeakerId.html#/s:10AppToolkit9S.name: confidence
Structs/SpeakerId.html#/s:10AppToolkit9S.abstract: Confidence in the ID of the person

Structs/LPSPosition.html#/s:10AppToolkit.name: position
Structs/LPSPosition.html#/s:10AppToolkit.abstract: 3D base coordinate location of the entity.

Structs/SpeechInfo.html#/s:10AppToolkit1.name: languageCode
Structs/SpeechInfo.html#/s:10AppToolkit1.abstract: Language of what Jibo heard. Currently only English is supported.

Structs/ScreenGestureListenParams.html#/.name: type
Structs/ScreenGestureListenParams.html#/.abstract: Can be either a tap or a swipe of a certain direction.

Structs/ScreenGestureListenParams.html#/.name: area
Structs/ScreenGestureListenParams.html#/.abstract: Area of the screen in which to listen for a gesture.

Structs/ScreenGestureListenParams.html.name: ScreenGestureListenParams
Structs/ScreenGestureListenParams.html.abstract: Parameters for listening for a screen gesture

Structs.html#/s:10AppToolkit6CircleV.name: Circle
Structs.html#/s:10AppToolkit6CircleV.abstract: Defines a circular area on Jibo’s screen.

Structs/LPSPosition.html.name: LPSPosition
Structs/LPSPosition.html.abstract: Location of something in Jibo’s LPS system. Can be a face, motion, or other visual entity.

Structs/Speaker.html.name: Speaker
Structs/Speaker.html.abstract: Info on the speaker of what Jibo heard

Structs.html#/s:10AppToolkit5RobotV.name: Robot
Structs.html#/s:10AppToolkit5RobotV.abstract: Information for the robot we’re connecting to.

Protocols/BatteryProtocol.html#/s:10AppT.name: capacity
Protocols/BatteryProtocol.html#/s:10AppT.abstract: Current capacity of the battery in amphours

Protocols/BatteryProtocol.html#/s:10AppT.name: maxCapacity
Protocols/BatteryProtocol.html#/s:10AppT.abstract: Maximum capacity of the battery in amphours

Protocols/BatteryProtocol.html#/s:10AppT.name: chargeRate
Protocols/BatteryProtocol.html#/s:10AppT.abstract: Charge rate of battery. Negative means draining. Positive means charging.

Protocols/TrackedEntityProtocol.html#/s:.name: confidence
Protocols/TrackedEntityProtocol.html#/s:.abstract: How confident Jibo is in his identification of the entity.

Protocols/TrackedEntityProtocol.html#/s:.name: worldCoords
Protocols/TrackedEntityProtocol.html#/s:.abstract: 3D point in space where the entity exists.

Protocols/TrackedEntityProtocol.html#/s:.name: screenCoords
Protocols/TrackedEntityProtocol.html#/s:.abstract: Rectangular area on Jibo’s screen where the entity was seen.

Protocols/MotionEntityProtocol.html#/s:1.name: worldCoords
Protocols/MotionEntityProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: 3D point of the motion in space.

Protocols/MotionEntityProtocol.html#/s:1.name: screenCoords
Protocols/MotionEntityProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: 2D coordinate of the motion detected relative to Jibo’s screen.

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: isAuthenticated
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: true if the robot has been successfully authenticated.

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: authenticate(completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Authenticate with Jibo cloud. This function will prompt users to

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: invalidate(completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Remove authentication for the account. Users will have to authenticate again

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: getRobotsList(completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Get a list of all robots associated with the user’s authenticated account.

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: connect(robot:completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Connect to a robot. Can only be called for robots where isAuthenticated = true

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: lookAt(targetType:trackFlag:levelHeadFlag:completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Make Jibo look toward a specific spot.

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: takeVideo(videoType:duration:completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Get a stream of what Jibo’s cameras see.

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: getFaceEntity(completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Get a face to track. Currently unsupported.

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: fetchAssetWithURI(_:name:completion:)
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Retrieve external asset and store in local cache by name.

Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.name: useSimulator
Protocols/CommandLibraryInterface.html#/.abstract: Turn on Jibo Simulator flow. Default value is false.

Protocols/RobotInfoProtocol.html#/s:10Ap.name: robotName
Protocols/RobotInfoProtocol.html#/s:10Ap.abstract: My-Friendly-Robot-Name, found on the underside of the robot’s base.

Protocols/MixersProtocol.html.name: MixersProtocol
Protocols/MixersProtocol.html.abstract: Mixer info for volume levels for listening from Jibo’s microphone array

Protocols/PositionProtocol.html.name: PositionProtocol
Protocols/PositionProtocol.html.abstract: Jibo’s current position, defined as his global 3D position and his 2D twist position.

Enums/LookAtTargetType.html#/s:10AppTool.name: entity
Enums/LookAtTargetType.html#/s:10AppTool.abstract: A face in Jibo’s field of vision. Currently unsupported.

Enums/EntityType.html#/s:10AppToolkit10E.name: person
Enums/EntityType.html#/s:10AppToolkit10E.abstract: Entity seen is a known loop member.

Enums/EntityType.html#/s:10AppToolkit10E.name: unknown
Enums/EntityType.html#/s:10AppToolkit10E.abstract: Entity seen is not a loop member.

Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.name: headTouchExit
Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.abstract: 4000: The Remote app was exited via head touch on robot

Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.name: robotError
Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.abstract: 4001: The Remote app was exited due to an error on the robot resulting in the error display taking over.

Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.name: newConnection
Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.abstract: 4002: A new Remote connection is superseding the existing one.

Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.name: inactivityTimeout
Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html#/s:10AppT.abstract: 4003: The connection was closed due to inactivity (no commands sent)

Enums/EventType.html#/s:10AppToolkit9Eve.name: lookAtAchieved
Enums/EventType.html#/s:10AppToolkit9Eve.abstract: Jibo looked at the spot he was told to look at

Enums/EventType.html#/s:10AppToolkit9Eve.name: videoReady
Enums/EventType.html#/s:10AppToolkit9Eve.abstract: URL to video is ready to stream

Enums/EventType.html#/s:10AppToolkit9Eve.name: listenResult
Enums/EventType.html#/s:10AppToolkit9Eve.abstract: Jibo got a result back from listening

Enums/EventMessageError.html#/s:10AppToo.name: invalid
Enums/EventMessageError.html#/s:10AppToo.abstract: 1021: The event message received has an invalid event and/or body

Enums/EventMessageError.html#/s:10AppToo.name: unsupported
Enums/EventMessageError.html#/s:10AppToo.abstract: 1022: SDK recieved an unsupported event. Event is deprecated or unimplemented.

Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html.name: RobotDisconnectCode
Enums/RobotDisconnectCode.html.abstract: Reason the app was exited or connection was lost

Enums/EntityType.html.name: EntityType
Enums/EntityType.html.abstract: When Jibo sees an entity, it is either a face and is recognized as a loop member,

Classes/ScreenGestureInfo/ScreenGestureT.name: tap
Classes/ScreenGestureInfo/ScreenGestureT.abstract: Tap at a 2D coordinate on Jibo’s screen.

Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.name: leftFront
Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.abstract: 0 true if left front sensor is touched

Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.name: leftMiddle
Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.abstract: 1 true is left middle sensor is touched

Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.name: leftBack
Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.abstract: 2 true if left back sensor is touched

Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.name: rightFront
Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.abstract: 3 true if right front sensor is touched

Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.name: rightMiddle
Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.abstract: 4 true if right middle sensor is touched

Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.name: rightBack
Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html#/.abstract: 5 true if right back sensor is touched

Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html.name: HeadSensors
Classes/HeadTouchInfo/HeadSensors.html.abstract: There are 6 touch sensors on the back of Jibo’s head. Three run

Classes/MotionInfo.html#/s:10AppToolkit1.name: motions
Classes/MotionInfo.html#/s:10AppToolkit1.abstract: Info for the motion that was seen. See MotionEntityProtocol

Classes/TakePhotoInfo.html#/s:10AppToolk.name: name
Classes/TakePhotoInfo.html#/s:10AppToolk.abstract: Name of the image in local cache

Classes/TakePhotoInfo.html#/s:10AppToolk.name: positionTarget
Classes/TakePhotoInfo.html#/s:10AppToolk.abstract: 3D base coordinate of where Jibo was when he took the photo

Classes/TakePhotoInfo.html#/s:10AppToolk.name: angleTarget
Classes/TakePhotoInfo.html#/s:10AppToolk.abstract: 2D orientation of Jibo when he took the photo

Classes/SayCompletedInfo.html#/s:10AppTo.name: type
Classes/SayCompletedInfo.html#/s:10AppTo.abstract: Emitted when Jibo has finished his say command.

Classes/LookAtAchievedInfo.html#/s:10App.name: positionTarget
Classes/LookAtAchievedInfo.html#/s:10App.abstract: 3D base coordinate frame of the robot. See Vector3.

Classes/LookAtAchievedInfo.html#/s:10App.name: angleTarget
Classes/LookAtAchievedInfo.html#/s:10App.abstract: 2D current orientation of the robot, See AngleVector

Classes/MotionInfo.html.name: MotionInfo
Classes/MotionInfo.html.abstract: When Jibo sees motion in his field of vision

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
